title: Start
body:
<<You>>
*I open my eyes, face on the ground*
uhhhgg... what happened...
<<UN>>
Get up meat bag. We have an island to take over.
<<You>>
I look up to see a weird dino-shaped man.
[[That’s a mask right?|1A]]
[[What are you?? And why are you bigger than a horse on steroids???|1B]]
[[Please spare my life!!|1C]]

title: 1A
body:
<<UN>>
<<emotion happy>>
Im real alright!
<<emotion normal>>
Im as dino as you are human!
[[2nd]]

title: 1B
body:
<<UN>>
<<emotion happy>>
I am Dilophosaurus and I am the strongest of my kind!!
<<addmeter 5>>
[[2nd]]

title: 1C
body:
<<UN>>
<<emotion angry>>
Relax boy!!
WE DONT NEED THAT WEEKNESS HERE!!!
[[2nd]]

title: 2nd
body:
<<emotion normal>>
<<diego>>
My name is Diego.
I need humans like you to join my fight against the T-rex.
[[I’m not fighting in your so call war|2A]]
[[T-rex huh? I think you just want extra bodies to throw at him.|2B]]
[[You want “me”? I just a visitor, how exactly will I be useful against an T-rex|2C]]

title: 2A
body:
<<emotion angry>>
This war I’m fighting…. is for everyone and I know you have no where to get out so what is it going to be. Death or Honor?
[[Please… just let me go. This is crazy!!!|A1]]
[[Why this particular T-rex?|A2]]
[[If I join your fight…will you let me go?|A3]]

title: 2B
body:
Everyone has a place in my army and your place will be very efficient in my plans.
[[What do I have to offer?|B1]]
[[Are you planning to use me as bait for the T-rex?|B2]]
[[Who is in your army?|B3]]

title: 2C
body:
Your the visitor which means they gave you access to every building on the island.
[[This card? You just want me to gather information?|C1]]
[[So I will be giving you a tactical advantage over the T-rex?|C2]]
[[You can find some other person|C3]]

title: A1
body:
So be death...
<<chomp>>
*CHOMP*
<<lessmeter 999>>
be

title: A2
body:
IT killed my family and not only that it went on a rampage massacring anyone in its path. I have my own reasons, but you have your own reason as well.
<<You>>
Fine...
Ill join.
<<emotion happy>>
<<diego>>
really?
Good choice friend.
<<addmeter 10>>
[[3rd]]

title: A3
body:
<<emotion normal>>
Like a Pardon? I will give you one if we won the war and if your still alive
<<You>>
Fine...
Ill join.
<<emotion happy>>
<<diego>>
really?
Good choice friend.
<<addmeter 20>>
[[3rd]]

title: 3rd
body:
<<emotion normal>> 
The card you have gives us the upper hand against him and we can scout the area so we could plan our attack
[[If this work, then I hope you the best|3A]]
[[When do we start?|3B]]
[[I’m no tactician. Can’t you find some other dinosaur?|3C]]

title: B1
body:
<<addmeter 20>>
Your position involves getting intel and accessing buildings to which I have no access to.
[[3rd]]

title: B2
body:
<<addmeter 5>>
That was one of my ideas, but since you have the card, I have a better idea for you.
[[3rd]]

title: B3
body:
I have a group of velociraptor, humans, and Triceptops.
<<addmeter 5>>
[[3rd]]

title: C1
body:
<<emotion angry>>
Information is power. I know that the T-rex thinks it is the strongest. It true, but his advantages is only physical.
[[3rd]]

title: C2
body:
<<addmeter 20>>
The T-rex strength is limited and with the amount of enemies he has, he will be taken down successfully.
[[3rd]]

title: C3
body:
<<emotion sad>>
The other guy is gone…
<<emotion angry>>
and you don’t have a choice.
<<lessmeter 10>>
[[3rd]]

title: 3A
body:
We don’t need hope to win.
<<emotion happy>>
Just confidence.
[[4th]]

title: 3B
body:
<<emotion happy>>
Let's get going then.
<<addmeter 10>>
[[4th]]

title: 3C
body:
<<emotion angry>>
No other dinosaur can use the keycard because they not smart enough to use it.
Why cant you just help us...
<<lessmeter 10>>
[[4th]]

title: 4th
body:
<<You>>
Alright,
I'm ready.
<<emotion happy>>
<<diego>>
thats what I like to hear.
<<addmeter 5>>
<<emotion normal>>
If you are called apon the great beyond, what name shall we remember you by?
[[Robert.|4A]]
[[You wont need one. I’m not gonna die today|4B]]
[[Does it matter?|4C]]

title: 4A
body:
“Robert”.....
<<emotion happy>>
<<addmeter 20>>
That'll be the name me and the rest of the boys will know till the end.
[[end]]

title: 4B
body:
<<emotion happy>>
<<addmeter 10>>
Aha ha ha ha ha ha haaaa-
<<emotion normal>>
Are you that confident? At least your a hopeful one.
[[end]]

title: 4C
body:
<<lessmeter 5>>
You're right,
but who will remember you when you're gone?
[[end]]

title: end
body:
<<You>>
*We soon found ourselves walking with the rest of the pack.*
*We didn't how our nights were going to go
Or if we were to see the next sunrise.*
*But that didn't matter
We had dino to hunt.*
<<end>>
end
